title: Missing emote
body:
So I opened a chest and it gave me the tea time emote. I can't find it anywhere in the collection emotes or the emote thingy in the hextech crafting. What do I do? Has this happened to anyone?
It does show it as owned in the store though

replies.body: Hey I looked into this for you and do see that you successfully unlocked the emote!  There might have been a delay in adding to your collection, try restarting your client to try and sync that up.
Bumping this thread.I just received an El Leon Gnar emote from a leveling capsule and I have logged out and logged in a dozen times already but the emote still won't appear in my collection.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ykkT7wB7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-10T17:26:13.134+0000)
>
> Hey I looked into this for you and do see that you successfully unlocked the emote!  There might have been a delay in adding to your collection, try restarting your client to try and sync that up.

Firstly thank you for the Lightning fast respond. I did restart it and it was there. Not sure what had happened but thank you. Whatever you did worked.
